Combat
Hit Points: 53 Initiative: 5 Armor Class: 20 Attacks Per Round: 2
Armor Proficiency: Heavy; Light; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: None Shield: Shield Weapons: Claws (+7 1d4+4); Flail (+7 1d8+4); Handaxe (+7 1d6+4 R20/60); Quarterstaff (+7 1d6+4); Unarmed (+7 1+4)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +24
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +5
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +5
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +5
Dragon Hide: +3 AC in no armor
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Fighting Style (Archery): +2 ranged attacks
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Strength Damage Adjustment: +4
Action Surge: Can take an extra action once per short rest
Combat Superiority: Can use a d8 Superiority Die to perform one of 5 chosen Maneuvers 5 times per short rest
Commander's Strike: Can use a Superiority Die and forego an attack to gain a bonus action directing an ally to attack; the ally uses a reaction to attack and adds the Superiority Die to its damage
Disarming Attack: Can add a Superiority Die to damage and cause the target to drop an item (save DC 16 Strength negates)
Dragon Fear: R30' May use Breath Weapon to frighten targets for 1 min (DC 14 Wisdom neg)
Dragon Hide: May use claws as a natural slashing weapon
Dwarven Fortitude: May spend one Hit Die to regain HD + 3 HP during Dodge action
Elven Accuracy: May reroll 1 die when attacking w/Adv using Dexterity, Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma
Fade Away: May use Reaction upon taking damage to become invisible for 1 rd (attacking ends) 1/short rest
Know Your Enemy: Knows how foe compares to self after 1 min study
Orcish Fury: May add a die to weapon damage 1/short rest/May use Reaction immediately after Relentless Endurance for an extra attack
Parry: Can use a reaction to subtract a Superiority Die + 5 from a foe's melee damage to self
Second Chance: May use Reaction to force a foe attack reroll 1/encounter or short rest
Second Wind: Can use a bonus action to regain 1d10+8 hit points once per short rest
Squat Nimbleness: Adv on Athletics or Acrobatics to break a grapple
Sweeping Attack: After a successful melee attack, can inflict a Superiority Die HP on a second adjacent foe
Trip Attack: After a successful attack, can knock the Large or smaller target prone (save DC 16 Strength negates) and add a Superiority Die to damage
Save Proficiency: Constitution; Strength
Save: Charisma: 3; Constitution: 6; Dexterity: 5; Intelligence: 0; Strength: 7; Wisdom: 4
Save Notes: Infernal Constitution: Resistance to cold and poison damage/Adv on saves vs. poison
Magic
Spell Slots: D0
Spells:
Detect Magic (Drow High Magic1 [Drow High Magic] Divi): R30' Reveals magic auras and their schools for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Dispel Magic (Drow High Magic3 [Drow High Magic] Abju): R120' Ends the effects on the target of a spell up to level 3, and successful DC 10 + spell level checks end each higher-level spell [+Level ends any spell of equal or lesser level]
Levitate (Drow High Magic2 [Drow High Magic] Tran): R60' Target floats (save Constitution negates) and can be moved up or down 20' each rd for concentration up to 10 min
Longstrider (Wood Elf Magic1 [Wood Elf Magic] Tran): Touched gains +10' Speed for 1 hr [+Level affects +1 target]
Misty Step (Fey Teleportation2 [Fey Teleportation] Conj): Teleports self 30'
Pass Without Trace (Wood Elf Magic2 [Wood Elf Magic] Abju): Targets in a 30' radius gain +10 Stealth and become trackable only by magic for concentration up to 1 hr
Magic Notes:
Wood Elf Magic: Knows 1 D0 cantrip
Drow High Magic: May cast Detect Magic at will, Dispel Magic and Levitate 1/long rest
Fey Teleportation: May cast Misty Step 1/short rest
Flames Of Phlegethos: May reroll 1s on fire spell damage/When casting a fire spell, may inflict 1d4 HP fire on adjacent creatures and give 30' light for 1 rd
Wood Elf Magic: May cast Longstrider and Pass Without Trace 1/long rest
